(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP March))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ short) (NN season))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (DT some))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the)
                (ADJP (JJR lesser) (VBN known))
                (NNS cultivars)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(season-5, March-1)
cop(season-5, is-2)
det(season-5, the-3)
amod(season-5, short-4)
root(ROOT-0, season-5)
prep(season-5, for-6)
pobj(for-6, some-7)
prep(some-7, of-8)
det(cultivars-12, the-9)
dep(known-11, lesser-10)
amod(cultivars-12, known-11)
pobj(of-8, cultivars-12)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (JJ good) (NN news))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (NN durian) (NNS connoisseurs))
            (VP (VBG looking)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB walk)
                    (S
                      (NP (DT the) (NN road))
                      (ADJP (RBR less) (JJ traveled)))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP They))
      (VP (VBP come)
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ certain) (NNS plantations))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Malaysia)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (ADVP (RB generally))
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP have) (RB not)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG cultivated)
            (ADVP (RB as) (RB much))
            (PP (IN as)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ other)
                  (ADJP (RBR more) (JJ popular))
                  (NNS ones))
                (PP (RB because) (IN of)
                  (NP (JJ certain) (JJ undesirable) (NNS characteristics)))))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, come-2)
prep(come-2, from-3)
amod(plantations-5, certain-4)
pobj(from-3, plantations-5)
prep(plantations-5, in-6)
pobj(in-6, Malaysia-7)
cc(come-2, and-8)
advmod(cultivated-14, generally-9)
nsubj(cultivated-14, they-10)
aux(cultivated-14, have-11)
neg(cultivated-14, not-12)
aux(cultivated-14, been-13)
conj(come-2, cultivated-14)
advmod(much-16, as-15)
advmod(cultivated-14, much-16)
prep(cultivated-14, as-17)
det(ones-22, the-18)
amod(ones-22, other-19)
advmod(popular-21, more-20)
amod(ones-22, popular-21)
pobj(as-17, ones-22)
advmod(of-24, because-23)
prep(ones-22, of-24)
amod(characteristics-27, certain-25)
amod(characteristics-27, undesirable-26)
pobj(of-24, characteristics-27)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (MD may)
      (VP (VB be)
        (SBAR
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP they))
              (VP (VBP ripen)
                (ADVP
                  (ADVP (RB too) (RB quickly))
                  (CC or)
                  (ADVP (RB not) (RB as)))
                (ADVP (RB fleshy)))))
          (CC and)
          (SBAR (IN so)
            (S
              (NP (PRP they))
              (VP (VBP are) (RB not)
                (ADJP (RB as) (RB commercially) (JJ viable))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP
          (NP (DT another) (JJ short) (NN season))
          (PP (IN for)

              (NP (DT these) (NNS durians))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP May))))))

          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))

                (VP (VBG falling)
                  (PRT (RP off))

                    (NP (DT the) (NNS trees))

    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP D17))
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (NP (JJ large) (NNS thorns))))
    (CC and)

      (NP (PRP$ its) (JJ elongated) (NN shape))
      (VP (VBZ makes)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBP look)
              (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ similar))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Green) (NNP Bamboo))

                    (NP (NNP Tek) (NNP Kah))

    (. .)))
